encounters.title: Alpha Vantage Income Batch
encounters.summary: combine_inc_stmt.py batch-downloads annual income statements from Alpha Vantage for tickers listed in a text file and consolidates results into a single CSV.

encounters.title: NSE Ticker List
encounters.summary: nsepy_list.py exports a snapshot of NSE tickers with company names using nsepy, producing a dated CSV.

encounters.title: Screener Profit/Loss Export
encounters.summary: screener.py scrapes the Profit & Loss table from Screener.in for an NSE company and exports it as CSV to avoid manual copy/paste.

encounters.title: yfinance Export
encounters.summary: yf_invest.py downloads historical daily OHLCV price data using Yahoo Finance (yfinance) for a ticker and lookback period (years), then exports a clean CSV.

encounters.title: Email Header Analyzer
encounters.summary: email_header_analyzer.py analyzes a saved email header text file and prints a quick triage report (SPF/DKIM signals, DMARC publication status, TLS hints, and a basic From vs Return-Path alignment check). It’s…

encounters.title: File Hash MD5
encounters.summary: generate_md5_hash.py computes the MD5 hash for a chosen file and writes the hash plus validation instructions to text outputs. It’s a practical integrity receipt for routine file sharing.

encounters.title: Net Monitor
encounters.summary: netmon.py captures local active network connections, enriches them with process context where available, prints a live view, and appends results to a CSV for lightweight evidence capture and troubleshooting.

encounters.title: SSL Cert Check
encounters.summary: SSLcert.py retrieves and displays SSL/TLS certificate metadata (subject/issuer/SAN/expiry) for a hostname. It is intentionally inspection-only and does not claim to enumerate supported TLS versions/ciphers.

encounters.title: PST To EML
encounters.summary: pst_to_eml.py converts an Outlook PST archive into .eml files (with attachments) using the external readpst tool, then converts extracted MBOX content into an EML folder tree.

encounters.title: Url Crawl To DOCX
encounters.summary: url_crawl.py crawls a website (same-domain links) and exports extracted page text into a Word document with a section per URL. Guardrails are included to prevent runaway crawls.
